actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to postpone for a certain period the application of automobile emission standards and to provide that no new automobile safety standards shall be imposed for a period of 3 years.

summary.text: Postpones for a period of 3 years the application of automobile emission standards under the Clean Air Act. Provides that no new automobile safety standards shall be imposed for a period of three years under the National Traffic and Motor vehicle Safety Act, the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act, or any other Federal law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to postpone for a certain period the application of automobile emission standards and to provide that no new automobile safety standards shall be imposed for a period of 3 years.
